ygData.subject: Re: Ok, now what? (spoilers)
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes, we did sit outside the cave and kill just about everything. He never showed up, and after 8 hours we left We even killed inside the cave.. no way will we
ygData.messageBody:
Yes, we did sit outside the cave and kill just about everything. He never
showed up, and after 8 hours we left
We even killed inside the cave.. no way will we ever get them with the line
of shadow knights there...
----- Original Message -----
From: Princess Xaera <xaera@...>
To: <shadowknight@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, November 09, 1999 1:36 PM
Subject: Re: [shadowknight] Ok, now what? (spoilers)


> From: "Princess Xaera" <xaera@...>
>
> I'm not sure if this is broken or not (maybe just on our server), but we
did
> that for 12 hours straight over 2 days and the mino hero never spawned.
>
> So I don't know what's up with that.
>
> X.
>
>
